content:
{"settings":"{
    "workbench.iconTheme": "vscode-icons",
    "editor.mouseWheelZoom": true,
    "editor.fontFamily": "JetBrainsMono Nerd Font,monospace",
    "editor.fontSize": 18,
    "editor.fastScrollSensitivity": 10,
    "editor.mouseWheelScrollSensitivity": 4,
    "workbench.productIconTheme": "macos-modern",
    "workbench.colorTheme": "GitHub Dark Default",
    "git.enableSmartCommit": true,
    "window.menuBarVisibility": "toggle",
    "go.toolsManagement.autoUpdate": true,
    "git.autofetch": true,
    "explorer.confirmDelete": false,
    "security.workspace.trust.untrustedFiles": "open",
    "git.openRepositoryInParentFolders": "always",
    "explorer.confirmDragAndDrop": false,
    "notebook.output.scrolling": true,
    "haskell.manageHLS": "GHCup",
    "animations.Install-Method": "Apc Customize UI++",
    "apc.imports": [
        "file://${userHome}/.vscode/extensions/brandonkirbyson.vscode-animations-2.0.3/dist/updateHandler.js"
    ],
    "glassit-linux.opacity": 95,
    "winopacity.opacity": 200,
    "glassit.alpha": 210,
    "dateTime.clipboardFormat": "",
    "dateTime.padDays": true,
    "workbench.settings.applyToAllProfiles": [
        "dateTime.padDays"
    ],
    "dateTime.showDayOfMonth": true,
    "dateTime.showMonth": true,
    "workbench.editor.enablePreview": false,
    "git.confirmSync": false,
    "editor.fontVariations": false,
    "editor.codeLensFontFamily": "JetBrainsMono Nerd Font, monospace",
    "editor.minimap.autohide": true,
    "editor.minimap.scale": 2,
    "editor.minimap.sectionHeaderFontSize": 14,
    "editor.minimap.size": "fill",
    "editor.minimap.maxColumn": 130,
    "terminal.integrated.fontFamily": "JetBrainsMono Nerd Font, monospace",
    "terminal.integrated.fontSize": 3,
    "terminal.integrated.fontWeight": "normal",
    "terminal.integrated.mouseWheelZoom": true,
    "Notes.notesLocation": "/home/abhi/newqtile_test",
    "workbench.editorAssociations": {
        "{git,gitlens}:/**/*.{md,csv,svg}": "default"
    },
    "files.autoSave": "afterDelay",
    "code-runner.runInTerminal": true,
    "editor.minimap.enabled": false
}"}
